org.anarres.linguistics.core

Class Conjugator<E extends Enum>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.linguistics.core.Base
      • org.anarres.linguistics.core.Conjugator<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnglishConjugator, GermanConjugator

    public abstract class Conjugator<E extends Enum>
extends Base
    A conjugation routine for verbs.

    • Method Detail

      • setConjugation

        protected void setConjugation(E[] values)
        Sets the list of allowed conjugations (people). This is usually called from a subclass constructor as: setConjugation(MyConjugation.values());

      • getConjugations

        public List<E> getConjugations()
        Returns the list of allowed conjugations (people). These will be the values of an Enum.

      • getConjugation

        public abstract String getConjugation(String verb,
                    E person)
        Conjugates a verb for the given person.
        Parameters:
        verb - The root form of the verb.
        person - The person with respect to whom the verb is to be conjugated.
